Generate QC Report

generate_report.Rmd
library(metaboprep)

# the data
data_file <- system.file("extdata", "metabolon_v1_example.xlsx", package = "metaboprep2")

# import data 
dat <- read_metabolon_v1(system.file("extdata", "metabolon_v1_example.xlsx", package = "metaboprep"))

# create the object
m <- Metaboprep(data = dat$data[,,1], samples = dat$samples, features = dat$features)

# run QC
m <- m |>
  quality_control(source_layer = "input", 
                  sample_missingness  = 0.5, 
                  feature_missingness = 0.3, 
                  total_peak_area_sd  = 5, 
                  outlier_udist       = 5, 
                  outlier_treatment   = "leave_be", 
                  winsorize_quantile  = 1.0, 
                  tree_cut_height     = 0.5, 
                  pc_outlier_sd       = 5, 
                  derived_col         = NULL, 
                  xenobiotic_col      = NULL, 
                  sample_ids          = NULL, 
                  feature_ids         = NULL)
#> 
#> ── Starting Metabolite QC Process ──────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ℹ Validating input parameters...
#> ✔ Validating input parameters...
#> ℹ Sample & Feature Summary Statistics for raw data...
#> ✔ Sample & Feature Summary Statistics for raw data...
#> ℹ Copying input data to new 'qc' data layer...
#> ✔ data ready for QC.
#> ℹ Assessing for extreme sample missingness >=80%...
#> ✔ Extreme sample missingness exclusions assessment complete. (0 samples excluded)
#> ℹ Assessing for total feature missingness...
#> ✔ Total feature missingness exclusions assessment complete. (0 features excluded)
#> ℹ Assessing for extreme feature missingness >=80%...
#> ✔ Extreme feature missingness exclusions assessment complete. (0 features excluded)
#> ℹ Assessing for sample missingness at specified level of >=50%...
#> ✔ Sample missingness exclusions assessment complete. (0 samples excluded)
#> ℹ Assessing for feature missingness at specified level of >=30%...
#> ✔ Feature missingness exclusions assessment complete. (0 features excluded)
#> ℹ Calculating total peak abundance outliers at +/- 5 Sdev...
#> ✔ Total peak abundance outlier exclusions assessment complete. (0 samples excluded)
#> ℹ Running sample data PCA outlier analysis at +/- 5 Sdev...
#> ℹ Sample data outlier analysis complete.
#> ℹ Re-identify feature independence and PC outliers...
#> ℹ PCA outlier analysis 2 complete.
#> ℹ Creating final QC dataset...
#> ✔ Sample & Feature Summary Statistics for QC data complete.
#> 
#> ── Metabolite QC Process Completed ─────────────────────────────────────────────

# render report
generate_report(m,
                project = "myproject",
                output_dir=getwd(),
                output_filename=NULL,
                format="html",
                template="qc_report")
#> processing file: skeleton.Rmd
#> output file: skeleton.knit.md
#> /opt/hostedtoolcache/pandoc/3.1.11/x64/pandoc +RTS -K512m -RTS skeleton.knit.md --to html4 --from markdown+autolink_bare_uris+tex_math_single_backslash --output /home/runner/work/metaboprep/metaboprep/vignettes/myproject_metaboprep_qc_report.html --lua-filter /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmarkdown/lua/pagebreak.lua --lua-filter /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmarkdown/lua/latex-div.lua --embed-resources --standalone --variable bs3=TRUE --section-divs --table-of-contents --toc-depth 2 --template /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmd/h/default.html --no-highlight --variable highlightjs=1 --number-sections --variable theme=bootstrap --css styles.css --mathjax --variable 'mathjax-url=https://mathjax.rstudio.com/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML' --include-in-header /tmp/Rtmpj6BnCK/rmarkdown-str1eed35b10fb8.html
#>
